hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #the Boomerang#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Hookshot# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #1# major item.

DMT (Biggoron).text: When the moon hits Termina like a big pizza pie that's game over.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Magic Meter#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 1 Bottom

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Slingshot# and #an Ice Trap#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that invisible ghosts can be exposed with Deku Nuts.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #0# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a single #scrub in the crater# sells #the Ice Arrows#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #fairy outside Ganon's Castle# holds #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Bow#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #a Bow# can be found in #Goron City#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #2# major items.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
